Parameters

WallStackIndex
Type: SystemInt32
Wall Stack Index
PierIndex
Type: SystemInt32
Pier Output Index

Type: SystemInt32
Design leg Index
TieBarIndex
Type: SystemInt32
Tie bar Index
GUID
Type: SystemString
GUID
BarSize_Dia
Type: SystemDouble
Information about the size of Rebar Dia
BarSize_Area
Type: SystemDouble
Information about the size of Rebar Area
BarSize_Fy
Type: SystemDouble
Information about the size of Rebar Fy
BarSize_Notation
Type: SystemString
Information about the size of Rebar Notation
Spacing
Type: SystemDouble
Spacing of Tie, along the height
StartZ
Type: SystemDouble
Starting offset for placing the ties, along height, with respect to Design Leg Z Level
EndZ
Type: SystemDouble
Starting offset for placing the ties, along height, with respect to Design Leg Z Level
TieShape
Type: SystemInt32
Shape of the Tie Straight, JoggleSingle, JoggleDouble, Rectangular, Diamond, UEqual, UunEqqual, Circle, Spiral, RectangularLapped 'Incident #16730, Rectangle90, Rectangle135, RectLap90 'Incident #16730, RectLap135 'Incident #16730, U90, U135, UandTie90, UandTie135, LTieWithLip, Circular
NumberOfTiePlines
Type: SystemInt32
Number of Polyline(s) of the Bar shapes, in Local Design Leg Coordinates

Return Value

Type: Int32
Returns zero if the function is successful; otherwise it returns a nonzero value.
